thread.title: Shares in retailer Carrefour fall after weak Q1 sales

title: Shares in retailer Carrefour fall after weak Q1 sales
text:
Shares in retailer Carrefour fall after weak Q1 sales 4:33pm IST - 00:58 
Carrefour's shares fell on Thursday to touch their lowest level since October 2012, after the French food retailer reported a slowdown in sales growth during the first quarter. Kate King reports.
